update tb_employee
emp_code = #{empCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_mobilephone = #{empMobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_card_no = #{empCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_sex = #{empSex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
emp_birthday = #{empBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
emp_status = #{empStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
emp_entry_date = #{empEntryDate,jdbcType=DATE},
emp_dimission_date = #{empDimissionDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_employee set emp_code = #{empCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_mobilephone = #{empMobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_card_no = #{empCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_sex = #{empSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, emp_birthday = #{empBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, emp_status = #{empStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_entry_date = #{empEntryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, emp_dimission_date = #{empDimissionDate,jdbcType=DATE} where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
